original: @128a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @128a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sarb'a rtha s'a dha ka badzra gho na s'a dha na n'a ma /
analyzed: sarb'a rtha s'a dha ka badzra gho na s'a dha na n'a ma /
translated: Sarvārthasādhakavajraghonāmadhāraṇī

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rdo rje phag mo don kun grub pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo don kun grub pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
translated: Vajravārāhī, the Means of Attaining All Aims

original: rje btsun rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rje btsun rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the venerable Vajravārāhī.

original: aom hrim gh'a ta ya sarba dusht'a na h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes bya bas gtor ma byin nas bsam gtan bya'o //
analyzed: aom hrim gh'a ta ya sarba dusht'a na h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes bya bas gtor ma byin nas bsam gtan bya'o //
translated: Having given the bali with Oṃ hrīḥ ghaṭaya sarvaduṣṭān hūṃ phaṭ svāhā, one should perform the meditation.

original: lte ba'i dbus su ram gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa /
analyzed: lte ba'i dbus su ram gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa /
translated: In the center of the navel, from raṃ arises a triangular fire maṇḍala.

original: de'i dbus su padma dmar po 'dab ma bzhi pa /
analyzed: de'i dbus su padma dmar po 'dab ma bzhi pa /
translated: In its center is a red four-petaled lotus.

original: de'i steng du hr'i: yig bskal pa'i me lta bur 'bar bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du hr'i: yig bskal pa'i me lta bur 'bar bar gyur pa'o //
translated: Upon that, the syllable hrīḥ becomes blazing like the fire at the end of the eon.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid rdo rje phag mo sku mdog dmar mo /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid rdo rje phag mo sku mdog dmar mo /
translated: From that, one arises as Vajravārāhī, red in color,

original: gcer bu yi dags kyi gdan la zhabs g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum pas gnas pa /
analyzed: gcer bu yi dags kyi gdan la zhabs g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum pas gnas pa /
translated: naked, standing on a corpse seat with the right leg extended and the left drawn in,

original: dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa /
analyzed: dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa /
translated: with hair streaming upward.

original: thod pa'i dbu rgyan dang / phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa /
analyzed: thod pa'i dbu rgyan dang / phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa /
translated: She is adorned with a skull crown and the five symbolic ornaments.

original: phyag bzhi'i g-yas pas rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa /
analyzed: phyag bzhi'i g-yas pas rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa /
translated: Her four hands hold a vajra and a goad with the right hands,

original: g-yon pas kha tv'am bsten cing thod pa dang sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'dzin pa /
analyzed: g-yon pas kha tv'am bsten cing thod pa dang sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'dzin pa /
translated: and a khaṭvāṅga and a skull cup with the left hands.

original: zhal gcig ma /
analyzed: zhal gcig ma /
translated: She has one face.

original: spyan gsum ma /
analyzed: spyan gsum ma /
translated: She has three eyes.

original: khro gnyer drag tu gtsigs pa /
analyzed: khro gnyer drag tu gtsigs pa /
translated: She bares her fangs in a fierce grimace.

original: 'jigs mu rung ma /
analyzed: 'jigs mu rung ma /
translated: She is terrifying.🔽She has a large belly.

original: gsus khyim che ba dang ldan pa'i @128b rdo rje phag mor bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: gsus khyim che ba dang ldan pa'i @128b rdo rje phag mor bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Meditate on Vajravārāhī.

original: 'dab ma bzhi la bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i padma'i snod rnams bsam mo //
analyzed: 'dab ma bzhi la bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i padma'i snod rnams bsam mo //
translated: On the four petals, imagine skull cups filled with the five elixirs.

original: aom badzra b'a r'a h'i a'a pe sha ya /
analyzed: aom badzra b'a r'a h'i a'a pe sha ya /
translated: Oṃ vajra-vārāhī āveśaya

original: sarba dusht'a na hr'im sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sarba dusht'a na hr'im sv'a h'a /
translated: sarva-duṣṭān hūṃ svāhā.

original: nye ba'i snying po'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i snying po'o //
translated: This is the quintessence.

original: aom h'um hrim h'um /
analyzed: aom h'um hrim h'um /
translated: Oṃ hūṃ hriṃ hūṃ.

original: snying po'o // 'bum phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: snying po'o // 'bum phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o //
translated: This is the essence. Recite it one hundred thousand times.

original: mnyam par gzhag par gyur pas 'dir the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag par gyur pas 'dir the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: One who is in equipoise will accomplish it without doubt.

original: aom a'a: hrim h'am ha: sngags 'dis bris sku'i drung du sha chen bye mar byas pa'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom a'a: hrim h'am ha: sngags 'dis bris sku'i drung du sha chen bye mar byas pa'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o //
translated: With the mantra Oṃ āḥ hrīṃ hūṃ hāṃ haḥ, one should offer incense of great flesh ground into powder in front of the painting.

original: ji srid du zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji srid du zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: One will be successful within twenty-one days,

original: rnam pa gzhan gyis ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan gyis ma yin no //
translated: not in any other way.

original: aom hr'im h'am ha:ha:h'i phem phem phem phat kyi yi ges bdag nyid kyi bdud thams cad zhi ba'i don du mtshan mo gtor ma byin no //
analyzed: aom hr'im h'am ha:ha:h'i phem phem phem phat kyi yi ges bdag nyid kyi bdud thams cad zhi ba'i don du mtshan mo gtor ma byin no //
translated: With the syllables Oṃ hrīṃ hāṃ haḥ haḥ hīṃ pheṃ pheṃ phaṭ, one should offer the evening oblation for the sake of pacifying all one’s own māras.

original: mtshan mo gtor ma dang nyer spyod lngas mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan mo gtor ma dang nyer spyod lngas mchod par bya'o //
translated: One should worship with the evening oblation and the five offerings.

original: gal te gang ci yang rung ba la smra bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te gang ci yang rung ba la smra bar bya'o //
translated: One should speak whatever is suitable.

original: de yang 'dir the tshom med par rdo rje rnal 'byor mas byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang 'dir the tshom med par rdo rje rnal 'byor mas byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
translated: And here, without doubt, Vajrayoginī will bless one.

original: dpal rdo rje phag mo'i rtog pa las ;
analyzed: dpal rdo rje phag mo'i rtog pa las ;
translated: From the Tantra of Glorious Vajravārāhī,

original: rdo rje phag mo kun grub pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo kun grub pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: the Means of Accomplishment of All-Accomplishing Vajravārāhī is complete.

original: // / rgya gar shar phyos kyi pandi ta chen po shr'i ban ratna'i zhal snga nas dang / lo ts'a ba 'jam dpal ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar shar phyos kyi pandi ta chen po shr'i ban ratna'i zhal snga nas dang / lo ts'a ba 'jam dpal ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: The great pandita of eastern India, Shri Dharmarata, and the translator, Jampal Yeshi, translated this.
